outputs.output_descr: The work proposed under the Community Water Initiative seeks to achieve results in UNDPs 2004-2007 Multi-Year Funding Framework Goal 3:  energy and environment for sustainable development.  Within the overall framework of service line 3.2, effective water governance, CWI addresses the cross cutting areas of poverty-environment linkages; climate change and community based initiatives.  CWI is directed to two pillars of the Integrated Package of Services for achieving the MDGs:  widening policy options and choices; and strengthening national capacity to deliver.  Together, these provide the framework for CWI's 2006 work plan priorities and implementation strategy.
